text: Dr Tan is knowledgeable and patient. My experience with the admin ladies are pleasant, no problems whatsoever.
Doctor good but 2 admin lady is the worst in Gleneagles Singapore. Visited tons of clinic in gleneagles, no admin staff can fight with this clinic. Simply rude and not helpful

Doctor is good but I’ve never met a ruder receptionist. It’s like she doesn’t even care about the job or the consequence of potentially losing clients. Seeing other reviews, this is a common issue faced by many. Why is the short haired lady still hired? Why doesn’t doctor acknowledge and rectify it? Or is he the one endorsing such behavior? Genuinely curious.

I totally agree that Dr Tan is super nice, knowledgeable and friendly towards his patients but what puts me off will be his 2 admin girls. People who come to the clinic is already unwell but still have to tolerate their rude behavior and bad attitude. I wonder if the doctor knows about this?

Dr Tan is one of the best nephrologist in Singapore. My wife is a long term patient of his for many years.
Not only he is an excellent Kidney Doctor, Dr Tan possesses a remarkable level of empathy and compassion. He genuinely cares about his patients' overall well-being and goes above and beyond to provide emotional support.
